name: When the World Screamed
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is equal to the current Depth Level.
[cultist]: -3. If you fail by 2 or more, you cannot move until the end of the round.
[tablet]: -2. If you fail by 2 or more, place 1 horror on the furthest [[Mechanism]] location from you.
[elder_thing]: -4. -6 instead if this test is targeting an [[Elite]] enemy or [[Strata]] location.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is equal to 1 more than the current Depth Level.
[cultist]: -4. If you fail by 2 or more, you cannot move until the end of the round.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, place 1 horror on the furthest [[Mechanism]] location from you.
[elder_thing]: -6. -8 instead if this test is targeting an [[Elite]] enemy or [[Strata]] location.

flavor:
"Put me alone, sir, and with my back to the wall.
G. E. C. is happiest then."
--- The Lost World, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
name: Professor George Challenger
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test during your turn, exhaust Professor George Challenger: Until the end of your turn, you get +1 to each skill other than the one used in this test.

name: Planetary Tissue Sample
text:
Fast. Uses (3 samples).
[reaction] When you initiate a skill test, spend 1 sample and choose one:
- Set your base skill value equal to your location's shroud value for this test.
- Set the base difficulty of this skill test equal to your location's shroud value.
